settings.title: Returns and Exchanges
settings.text: We accept returns of unused products within 30 calendar days of order being placed.

settings.title: I want a different color
settings.description:
1. Select the item you’re sending back.
2. You’ll be prompted to select a new size or color - do just that!
3. Print your return label and mail back the original item.
4. We’ll ship the new item to you right away.

settings.title: I want a different product
settings.description:
1. Select the item you’re sending back.
2. You’ll be prompted to select a new size or color - do just that!
3. Print your return label and mail back the original item.
4. We’ll ship the new item to you right away.

settings.title: I want a refund
settings.description:
1. Select the item you’re sending back and request a refund.

2. You’ll get an Instant Voucher but you don’t have to use it.

3. Print your return label and mail back the original item.

4. Once received, we'll refund back to your original $$$.

settings.title: How would you like to proceed?
